issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
HiveServer2 performance regresses severely due to what appears to be a leak in the ZooKeeper connections. lsof output on the HS2 process shows about 8000 TCP connections to the ZK ensemble nodes.

grep TCP lsof-hive-node11 | grep node11 | grep -E "node03|node04|node05" | wc -l
    7866 
grep TCP lsof-hive-node11 | grep node11 | grep -E "node03" | wc -l
    2615
grep TCP lsof-hive-node11 | grep node11 | grep -E "node04" | wc -l
    2622
grep TCP lsof-hive-node11 | grep node11 | grep -E "node05" | wc -l
    2629


node11 - HMS node
node03, node04 and node05 are the hosts for zookeeper ensemble.
fields.summary: Zookeeper connection leaks in Hive's HBaseHandler.

comments.body: I am attaching a patch that closes the HTable associated connections to ZooKeeper in the event of an exception or pre-mature return. Also clean up resources at the end of the method or when the instances are finalized.
Review posted at https://reviews.apache.org/r/39613/. Thank you in advance.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12768428/HIVE-12250.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error

Test results: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build/5768/testReport
Console output: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build/5768/console
Test logs: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build-5768/
